Texto: 
afebrile
palpable masses noted in right neck and abdomen
chemotherapy followed by bone marrow transplant
• periaortic adenopathy
• no intraspinal mass
• level vi cervical adenopathy
hodgkin's lymphoma
• leukemia
• neuoblastoma
• lymphoma
44 year old man with 3 year history of stage ivb hodgkin lymphoma. now presents with leg weakness.  mri done to exclude intraspinal tumor.
